1: We showed up for the last night of our 30th Anniversary trip ready to enjoy one last night in paradise only to find the hotel torn up for renovations
They are doing renovations now but a great room with great views
Unfortunately I had no idea that the hotel was undergoing a MASSIVE renovation
All renovation works be done in two monts
Went during their remodeling from a Mariot Courtyard to becoming a Sheraton
The rooms were nicely renovated but the pool area was closed which the website did NOT say it stated the property was renovating but not pool specific which is the main amenity I like to use
2: The property is newly updated from the lobby to the pool bar area to the rooms
The price was a little steep but a clean updated room is well worth it
The newly renovated Sheraton way more hip than the previous Courtyard at the Mariot
We got an updated room but lots of the hotel still under construction
Rooms are more or less the same but also refurbished with better TV etc
It turns out that remodeling was done with the most minimal effort
The pool is redone very nicely but pool heating would be nice in the winter it was so cold that one at to use a neoprene
The rooms needed a deep cleaning for sure it felt like whatever they have remodeled they just left and forgot to clean up before allowing people in
Why they put such a slippery surface tiles when they remodeled the pool yard
Inconsistent service windy beach and not so updated refurbished old hotel
